caption: MITRE D3FEND™
name: d3fend
description: The MITRE D3FEND™ object describes the tactic, technique & sub-technique associated with a countermeasure as defined in DEFEND MatrixTM.

d3f_tactic.description: The Tactic object describes the tactic ID and/or name that is associated with a countermeasure, as defined by D3FEND MatrixTM.

d3f_technique.description: The Defend Technique object describes the technique ID and/or name associated with a countermeasure, as defined by D3FEND MatrixTM.
